resources.string: Vstream â€“ Video Streaming application which is a video streaming application based on the android platform. The system aims to create a healthy and collaborative space. Users can view content based on their choice and upload the desired content to the application for other user sake. The developed system also provides features for expressing their acceptance in form of like button. It also provides the users to showcase their thoughts and views in the form of comment section. Users can find a specific video using the search option and users can also explore various different categories of videos available over the application.
